title: 01/08/2021 - HOUR 1 - Upsets, Allen-Mahomes, Brady, Browns
itunes:title: 01/08/2021 - HOUR 1 - Upsets, Allen-Mahomes, Brady, Browns
description:
Colin talks about possible upsets this NFL playoff weekend

Some people would take Josh Allen over Patrick Mahomes

Tom Brady was always going to win the divorce with the Patriots

The reason why the Steelers don't take the Browns seriously


Guest: Albert Breer
